message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can seal the deal!
You were too generous, now it's my turn to be fair.
You think you're fair, Bob? I'll show you what fair looks like!
You think you can outdo me? Bring it on!
You're getting desperate, Bob. Time to make a real offer!
I'm not desperate, just patient. Your turn to blink.
I'm not blinking, Bob. It's time to make a serious offer!
I'm not bluffing, Alice. This is my best offer.
You call that your best offer? I'm not impressed.
You're not impressed? I'm not done yet.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm making one last offer.
No more offers. This is the final deal.
